revised_title: Dental and Skeletal Analysis of the Cyprus Dwarf Elephant, Elephas cypriotes
tldr: This paper presents a detailed analysis of the teeth and bones of the Cyprus dwarf elephant, Elephas cypriotes, found in cave deposits. The study compares the dental and skeletal features of this species to other dwarf elephants from Malta and Sicily, and discusses its evolutionary relationships and the possible reasons for its isolation and differentiation.
